nodes.text: The Eye of Mesra was a small, round toy used for fortune-telling. Children in the city of Mos Espa on the desert planet Tatooine frequently played with "Eyes of Mesra" toys.

The Eye of Mesra first appeared in the 2003 Legends video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. It became canon when it was included in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia.
